name: BUMPER BALLS
description:
BUMPER BALLS: The Ultimate Raffle Game”

Looking for an exciting and customizable way to conduct raffles? Bumper Balls is the best game for the job. Dive into a world of fun, where you can choose from a variety of characters, maps, and game modes.

🌟 Features:

Classic Mode (Available Now):
- Draw for up to 30 players simultaneously.
- Keep it simple and timeless with the classic mode.

Upcoming Modes (Not Available Now):

Party Mode:
- Draw winners for an epic crowd of up to 1000 players!
- Turn your giveaways into massive celebrations.

Multiplayer Mode:
- Watch the draw unfold with your friends in real time.
- Share the excitement and cheer together.

Creative Mode:
- Unleash your imagination!
- Design your own unique characters for the ultimate personalized experience.

Join Bumper Balls and make your raffles unforgettable! 🎉🔥
